attributes.action: George Osborne MP, should resign as member of parliament for Tatton
attributes.background: George Osborne should resign as member of parliament for Tatton. To fulfill his role as editor of the London Evening Standard, and to avoid bringing the House of Commons in disrepute.  It is not possible for him to represent his constituents effectively while editing a daily paper.

rejection.details:
Complaints about breaches of the House of Commons Code of Conduct are investigated by the Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards, who is independent of Parliament and Government. You can find out more about the Commissioner and her role here:

http://www.parliament.uk/pcs
